description:
Healed by Mimiko’s blood, the Silver Blade launches his attack on Cassa. Much blood will be spilled to protect the secret of the Eleventh Yard and all that lays hidden there.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dla przetrwania naszego rodu, poświęcam mą krew
For the Eternal Pulse of Mine Bloodline, I Would Offer This Blood in Totality
For the Eternal Pulse of Mine Bloodline, I Would Offer This Blood in Totality
Waga Kettou no Eien Naru Kodou ga Tame Kono Chi no Subete o Sasagen Koto o
Ради продолженения моего рода я отдам всю свою кровь
我が血統の永遠なる鼓動がためこの血の総てを捧げんことを
